title: Large Group Capacity
description: Sleeps large groups comfortably with multiple bedrooms and flexible sleeping arrangements across all levels.

title: Private Indoor Heated Pool
description: Year-round heated indoor pool with keypad lock, safety alarm, and comfortable 82Â°F water temperature.

title: Hot Tub
description: Relax and unwind in the private hot tub after a day of activities and entertainment.

title: Home Theatre
description: Enjoy movie nights in your private home theatre with comfortable seating and premium sound system.

title: Game Rooms
description: Multiple game rooms featuring PS5, Nintendo Switch, arcade games, gaming chairs, poker table, billiards, and golf simulator.

title: Chef-Style Kitchen
description: Fully equipped modern kitchen with high-end appliances, expansive island with bar seating, pots, pans, dishware & utensils for large groups.

title: Multiple Patios
description: Patios on every level with fire pit, BBQ grill, and outdoor seating for enjoying fresh air and views.

title: High-Speed Wi-Fi
description: Fast and reliable high-speed Wi-Fi throughout the property for streaming, gaming, and remote work.

title: Smart TVs
description: Smart TVs in multiple rooms. Guests can access their own streaming subscriptions during their stay.

title: FREE Waterpark Access
description: Complimentary access to exclusive on-site waterpark with infinity pool, lazy river, splash pad, mini golf, pickleball court, and more.

title: Rooftop Adults' Den
description: Exclusive rooftop level with wet bar, seating, and games - the perfect adults-only retreat.

title: Ample Parking
description: Private on-site parking for up to 5 large SUVs or 6 mid-size vehicles. Fully paved access with no steep roads.

title: EV Charging Station
description: Level 2 EV charger (Legrand NEMA 14-50) with up to 40A charging speed for overnight charging convenience.

title: Climate Control
description: Central heating and air conditioning throughout the property for year-round comfort.

title: Electric Fireplace
description: Cozy electric fireplace in the open concept living room for ambiance and warmth.

title: Laundry Facilities
description: Washer and dryer available for guest use during extended stays.

title: Multiple Bathrooms
description: 8 total bathrooms (6 full, 2 half) strategically located across all levels with starter amenities provided.

title: Safety Features
description: Pool room keypad lock, safety alarms, smoke detectors, and first aid kit for guest safety.

title: Self Check-In
description: Convenient keyless entry system for flexible arrival times and hassle-free check-in.

title: Modern Design
description: Brand-new property with ultra-modern interiors, high-end finishes, and stylish furnishings throughout.
